Mechanics: Once per day, you can open the portal to purchase any mundane ingredient at normal market prices. Ingredients are always perfectly fresh and of the highest quality. Rare or exotic ingredients may be available for higher prices.

abilities.name: Planar Shopping
abilities.description: Access fresh ingredients from across the multiverse.

abilities.name: Quality Guarantee
abilities.description: All ingredients are perfectly fresh and of the highest quality.

name: Apron of Stain Resistance
location: Professional kitchen outfitters, chef uniform suppliers, practical magic vendors
description:
This practical canvas apron repels all stains, spills, and odors while protecting the wearer from kitchen hazards. It always appears clean and professional no matter what messy work is done.

Mechanics: The apron provides resistance to fire damage and acid damage. It never stains or retains odors, always appearing perfectly clean. The wearer has advantage on Constitution saves against nausea from strong smells.

abilities.name: Perpetual Cleanliness
abilities.description: Remains spotless and odor-free regardless of kitchen work.

abilities.name: Kitchen Safety
abilities.description: Protection from common kitchen hazards like burns and corrosive spills.

name: Serving Tray of Temperature Control
location: Fine dining restaurants, catering services, hospitality equipment suppliers
description:
This elegant silver serving tray keeps hot foods hot and cold foods cold indefinitely. It can be divided into zones with different temperatures and provides perfect service presentation.

Mechanics: The tray maintains the ideal temperature for any food placed on it. You can designate different temperature zones on the tray. Food stays at perfect serving temperature for up to 24 hours.

abilities.name: Thermal Perfection
abilities.description: Keep all foods at their optimal serving temperature simultaneously.

abilities.name: Zone Control
abilities.description: Create multiple temperature zones on the same tray.

name: Recipe Book of Endless Inspiration
location: Culinary libraries, master chef collections, cooking creativity workshops
description:
This leather-bound tome contains an infinite collection of recipes that appear based on available ingredients or desired outcomes. The book teaches new cooking techniques and adapts recipes to skill level.

Mechanics: The book shows you recipes based on ingredients you have available or effects you want to achieve. Following its recipes grants advantage on cooking checks and can create dishes with minor beneficial effects.

properties.Beneficial Effects: Recipes can provide minor magical benefits

abilities.name: Culinary Inspiration
abilities.description: Always provides the perfect recipe for your available ingredients.

abilities.name: Skill Development
abilities.description: Teaches new techniques and adapts to your cooking ability level.

name: Cleaver of Butchering Mastery
location: Butcher shops, meat processing facilities, professional kitchen suppliers
description:
This heavy cleaver can perfectly butcher any creature, maximizing yield and identifying the best cuts of meat. It ensures no waste and can even process magical creatures safely.

Mechanics: Functions as a +1 handaxe. When butchering, provides advantage on Survival checks and increases meat yield by 50%. Can safely process magical creatures without releasing dangerous magical effects.

abilities.name: Perfect Butchering
abilities.description: Maximize meat yield and quality from any creature.

abilities.name: Magical Processing
abilities.description: Safely butcher magical creatures without triggering harmful effects.

name: Preservation Box of Eternal Freshness
location: Food storage specialists, restaurant supply companies, preservation magic vendors
description:
This large wooden box maintains perfect preservation conditions for any food stored inside. Time moves slower within the box, keeping ingredients at peak freshness indefinitely.

Mechanics: Food stored in the box never spoils, maintaining perfect freshness indefinitely. The box can store up to 100 pounds of food. Items age at 1/100th normal rate while stored inside.

abilities.name: Temporal Preservation
abilities.description: Keep food at peak freshness by slowing time within the storage space.

abilities.name: Quality Maintenance
abilities.description: Preserve not just freshness but also flavor, texture, and nutritional value.

name: Mortar and Pestle of Grinding Perfection
location: Spice grinding specialists, herbalist shops, precision cooking tool vendors
description:
This marble mortar and pestle can grind any substance to the exact consistency desired, from coarse powder to ultra-fine dust. It works automatically and maintains perfect uniformity.

Mechanics: The pestle grinds ingredients automatically to any desired consistency. Provides advantage on checks involving spice preparation or herb grinding. Can process magical ingredients safely without losing their properties.

abilities.name: Precision Processing
abilities.description: Grind ingredients to exact specifications automatically.

abilities.name: Property Preservation
abilities.description: Magical ingredients retain their properties when ground.

name: Cauldron of Soup Multiplication
location: Large kitchen operations, catering services, communal dining facilities
description:
This iron cauldron can take a small portion of any soup or stew and multiply it to feed large groups while maintaining the exact same flavor and quality throughout.

Mechanics: Any liquid food placed in the cauldron can be multiplied to feed up to 50 people while maintaining identical flavor and nutritional value. The multiplication process takes 1 hour.

abilities.name: Portion Expansion
abilities.description: Turn a single serving into enough food for a large group.

abilities.name: Flavor Consistency
abilities.description: Every portion tastes exactly like the original recipe.

name: Rolling Pin of Perfect Dough
location: Professional bakeries, pastry shops, dough preparation specialists
description:
This enchanted rolling pin creates perfectly even dough thickness and can roll dough to impossibly thin specifications without tearing. It makes pastry work effortless and precise.

Mechanics: The rolling pin provides advantage on all baking and pastry-related cooking checks. Dough rolled with it is always perfectly even and can be made paper-thin without breaking.

abilities.name: Precision Rolling
abilities.description: Create perfectly even dough thickness every time.

abilities.name: Delicate Work
abilities.description: Roll dough impossibly thin for delicate pastries without tearing.

name: Whisk of Rapid Whipping
location: Baking supply stores, pastry equipment vendors, efficient kitchen tool shops
description:
This wire whisk whips ingredients at supernatural speed, creating perfect peaks, emulsions, and mixtures in seconds rather than minutes. It never over-whips or breaks delicate mixtures.

Mechanics: The whisk works 10 times faster than normal whipping and provides advantage on checks involving whipping, beating, or creating emulsions. It automatically stops at the perfect consistency.

abilities.name: Rapid Processing
abilities.description: Whip ingredients to perfect consistency in seconds.

abilities.name: Automatic Control
abilities.description: Never over-whips or breaks delicate mixtures.

name: Measuring Cups of Exact Portions
location: Precision baking suppliers, professional measurement tool vendors, accuracy equipment shops
description:
This set of measuring cups provides impossibly accurate measurements and can convert between any measurement systems instantly. They glow when the exact amount is reached.

Mechanics: The cups provide perfect measurements every time and automatically convert between measurement systems (imperial, metric, magical, etc.). They provide advantage on checks requiring precise measurements.

abilities.name: Measurement Mastery
abilities.description: Provide perfect measurements and automatic unit conversions.

abilities.name: Recipe Precision
abilities.description: Ensure exact proportions for consistent results every time.

name: Cutting Board of Sanitation
location: Kitchen safety equipment vendors, food sanitation suppliers, professional cooking gear stores
description:
This wooden cutting board automatically sanitizes itself and anything placed on it, preventing cross-contamination and eliminating harmful bacteria. It maintains perfect hygiene standards at all times.

Mechanics: The cutting board kills all harmful bacteria and prevents cross-contamination. Food prepared on it has extended shelf life and provides immunity to foodborne illness. The board never needs cleaning.

properties.Extended Shelf Life: Food lasts longer when prepared here

abilities.name: Perfect Hygiene
abilities.description: Eliminate all risk of foodborne illness and contamination.

abilities.name: Self-Cleaning
abilities.description: Never requires washing or maintenance while staying perfectly clean.

name: Strainer of Perfect Separation
location: Professional kitchen equipment, fine dining suppliers, precision cooking tool vendors
description:
This magical strainer can separate ingredients with impossible precision, filtering out exact particles sizes or specific substances while leaving everything else untouched.

Mechanics: The strainer can filter with perfect precision, removing exactly what you want while leaving everything else. It can separate substances by size, density, magical properties, or even conceptual differences.

properties.Multiple Criteria: Filter by size, density, magic, etc.

abilities.name: Precision Filtering
abilities.description: Remove exactly what you want while preserving everything else.

abilities.name: Magical Discrimination
abilities.description: Separate magical and mundane components from mixed ingredients.

name: Timer of Perfect Timing
location: Professional kitchen timers, cooking precision equipment, efficiency tool vendors
description:
This magical hourglass can track multiple cooking times simultaneously and alerts the chef when each dish reaches perfect doneness. It prevents overcooking and ensures optimal results.

Mechanics: The timer can track up to 10 different cooking processes simultaneously. It alerts you telepathically when each item is perfectly done. Provides advantage on timing-related cooking checks.

abilities.name: Simultaneous Tracking
abilities.description: Monitor multiple cooking processes with perfect timing for each.

abilities.name: Optimal Alerts
abilities.description: Receive telepathic notifications when each dish reaches perfection.

name: Necklace of Fireballs
location: Battle mage suppliers, military magic vendors, destruction magic specialists
description:
This necklace has 1d6+3 beads hanging from it. Each bead contains the concentrated essence of a fireball spell, glowing faintly with inner fire. You can detach beads and throw them as explosive weapons.

Mechanics: You can use an action to detach a bead and throw it up to 60 feet. When it reaches the end of its trajectory, the bead detonates as a 3rd-level fireball spell (save DC 15). The necklace regains 1d6+1 expended beads daily at dawn.

abilities.name: Detonate on Impact
abilities.description: Throw beads that explode as fireball spells on impact.

abilities.name: Daily Regeneration
abilities.description: Regain 1d6+1 expended beads each dawn.

name: Necklace of Prayer Beads
location: Divine temples, monastery gift shops, holy relic vendors, sacred artifact collections
description:
This necklace has 1d4+2 magical beads made from blessed materials. Each bead allows the wearer to cast a specific divine spell, providing spiritual power and protection to the faithful.

Mechanics: The necklace has several types of beads: blessing (bless), curing (cure wounds), favor (greater restoration), smiting (planar ally), summons (planar ally), and wind walking (wind walk). Each bead can be used once per day.

properties.Spell Variety: Different divine spells per bead type
properties.Daily Use: Each bead usable once per day

abilities.name: Divine Spellcasting
abilities.description: Cast various divine spells using the different types of prayer beads.

abilities.name: Spiritual Focus
abilities.description: Channel divine energy through blessed prayer beads.

name: Necklace of the Elements
location: Elemental temples, planar research facilities, elemental magic academies
description:
This intricate necklace features four gems representing the classical elements: ruby for fire, sapphire for water, emerald for earth, and diamond for air. Each gem pulses with elemental energy and grants mastery over its respective element.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you have resistance to fire, cold, lightning, and acid damage. Once per day each, you can cast fireball, ice storm, call lightning, and stone shape. The gems glow when their associated element is nearby.

abilities.name: Elemental Mastery
abilities.description: Resistance to all elemental damage types and ability to cast elemental spells.

abilities.name: Elemental Awareness
abilities.description: Detect the presence of elemental forces and creatures nearby.

name: Necklace of Life Protection
location: Ancient vaults, legendary treasure hoards, divine sanctuaries, immortality seekers
description:
This platinum necklace holds a single black pearl that seems to absorb light around it. The pearl contains a fragment of the wearer's life force, providing protection against the ultimate fate.

Mechanics: If you die while wearing this necklace, you immediately return to life as if by a true resurrection spell. The pearl is destroyed in the process. While wearing it, you are immune to any effect that would instantly kill you without dealing damage.

abilities.name: Deathward
abilities.description: Complete immunity to instant death effects and abilities.

abilities.name: Life Anchor
abilities.description: Automatically return to life if killed, destroying the pearl in the process.

name: Necklace of Telepathic Bond
location: Communication networks, spy organizations, family heirloom collections, mental magic vendors
description:
This silver chain holds a crystal pendant that resonates with the thoughts of others wearing identical necklaces. The crystals are grown in pairs or sets, maintaining a permanent telepathic connection.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can communicate telepathically with other wearers of matching necklaces within 1 mile. The communication is instantaneous and doesn't require line of sight. You can sense the general emotional state of connected wearers.

properties.Emotional Sensing: Feel general mood of connected wearers

abilities.name: Mental Link
abilities.description: Telepathic communication with other wearers of matching necklaces.

abilities.name: Empathic Connection
abilities.description: Sense the emotional state and well-being of connected individuals.

name: Necklace of Starlight
location: Celestial observatories, star-worshiping temples, cosmic magic vendors, night sky enthusiasts
description:
This delicate silver chain holds a pendant made from crystallized starlight that twinkles like a miniature constellation. It provides guidance and illumination drawn from the cosmos above.

Mechanics: The pendant sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. Once per day, you can cast the guidance spell at will for 1 hour. Under starlight or moonlight, you have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks for navigation.

properties.Guidance Spell: At will for 1 hour per day

abilities.name: Stellar Illumination
abilities.description: Provide light and enhanced guidance abilities drawn from starlight.

abilities.name: Celestial Navigation
abilities.description: Never get lost under the open sky and always know cardinal directions.

name: Necklace of Warding
location: Protective magic vendors, guardian temples, defensive magic academies, security specialists
description:
This heavy bronze necklace bears protective sigils from many different cultures and religions. The symbols glow when danger approaches, and the necklace provides comprehensive magical protection.

Mechanics: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws. The necklace warns you of danger by growing warm 1 minute before a hostile creature comes within 120 feet. Once per day, you can cast shield as a reaction.

abilities.name: Comprehensive Protection
abilities.description: Bonuses to both AC and saving throws for complete defensive enhancement.

abilities.name: Threat Detection
abilities.description: Early warning system for approaching hostile creatures.

name: Necklace of Beast Speech
location: Druid groves, ranger outposts, animal training facilities, nature magic vendors
description:
This leather cord necklace is adorned with carved animal teeth and claws from creatures across the natural world. It grants the wearer the ability to communicate with all manner of beasts.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can cast speak with animals at will. Additionally, beasts are initially friendly toward you unless you or your allies threaten them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks.

abilities.name: Universal Animal Communication
abilities.description: Speak with any beast at will and understand their responses.

abilities.name: Natural Affinity
abilities.description: Beasts instinctively trust you and are more cooperative.

name: Necklace of Healing Pearls
location: Healing temples, medical supply vendors, pearl diving treasures, restoration specialists
description:
This elegant gold chain holds five lustrous pearls, each one containing concentrated healing magic. The pearls glow with a soft white light when healing is needed nearby.

Mechanics: The necklace has 5 charges. You can expend 1 charge as an action to cast cure wounds (1st level), 2 charges for cure wounds (2nd level), or 3 charges for cure wounds (3rd level). The necklace regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

abilities.name: Flexible Healing
abilities.description: Cast cure wounds at different spell levels based on charges expended.

abilities.name: Healing Sense
abilities.description: Pearls glow softly when creatures within 30 feet are wounded.

name: Necklace of Memory Storage
location: Scholar libraries, memory preservation services, mental magic vendors, historical archives
description:
This intricate necklace features a pendant made of crystallized thoughts that can store and replay memories. The crystal changes color based on the emotions associated with stored memories.

Mechanics: You can store up to 10 memories in the crystal, each up to 1 minute long. You can replay stored memories as if experiencing them again. Once per day, you can share a stored memory with another creature by touching them with the pendant.

properties.Perfect Recall: Experience memories as if reliving them
properties.Memory Sharing: Share memories with others once per day

abilities.name: Memory Preservation
abilities.description: Store important memories in crystal form for perfect recall.

abilities.name: Experience Sharing
abilities.description: Allow others to experience your stored memories firsthand.

name: Necklace of Disguise
location: Spy equipment vendors, theater prop shops, infiltration specialists, identity change services
description:
This simple silver chain holds a pendant that constantly shifts between different shapes and materials. When activated, it creates convincing disguises that fool most observers.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can use an action to cast disguise self. The spell lasts for 8 hours or until you choose to end it. You can use this ability three times per day, and all uses recharge at dawn.

abilities.name: Extended Disguise
abilities.description: Create disguises that last much longer than normal magic.

abilities.name: Multiple Identities
abilities.description: Switch between different disguises throughout the day.

name: Necklace of Spell Storing
location: Arcane academies, spell research facilities, magical energy storage specialists
description:
This platinum necklace holds a large gemstone that can store magical energy for later use. The gem glows brighter as more spells are stored within it, becoming almost blindingly bright when full.

Mechanics: The necklace can store up to 5 levels of spells. Any creature can cast a spell into the necklace, and you can cast stored spells using the necklace. Stored spells use the original caster's spell save DC and attack bonus.

abilities.name: Spell Banking
abilities.description: Store spells cast by yourself or others for later use.

abilities.name: Collaborative Magic
abilities.description: Team members can contribute spells for the attuned wearer to use.

name: Necklace of Luck
location: Gambling houses, luck charm vendors, fortune improvement services, chance manipulation specialists
description:
This horseshoe-shaped pendant on a gold chain is made from meteoric iron and blessed by fortune deities. It subtly influences probability in the wearer's favor.

Mechanics: Once per day, when you make an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can choose to reroll the d20 and use the higher result. The pendant grows warm when used and cools down at dawn.

properties.Use Higher: Take the better of two rolls

abilities.name: Fortune's Favor
abilities.description: Reroll any d20 once per day and take the better result.

abilities.name: Probability Nudge
abilities.description: Subtle influence on random chance in your favor.

name: Necklace of Water Breathing
location: Underwater exploration suppliers, marine equipment vendors, aquatic magic specialists
description:
This coral and pearl necklace allows the wearer to breathe underwater as naturally as breathing air. The coral pieces pulse with a gentle blue light when submerged.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can breathe underwater indefinitely. You also gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed if you don't already have one.

abilities.name: Aquatic Adaptation
abilities.description: Breathe underwater as naturally as breathing air.

abilities.name: Enhanced Swimming
abilities.description: Gain swimming speed if you don't already have one.

name: Necklace of Resistance
location: Elemental protection vendors, damage resistance specialists, survival gear suppliers
description:
This necklace features a pendant made from a specific type of gemstone that determines its protective properties. The gem pulses with energy that shields the wearer from particular types of harm.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you have resistance to one type of damage. The type depends on the gemstone: ruby (fire), sapphire (cold), citrine (lightning), amethyst (thunder), emerald (acid), diamond (radiant), onyx (necrotic), or opal (psychic).

abilities.name: Elemental Ward
abilities.description: Resistance to a specific damage type based on the necklace's gemstone.

abilities.name: Energy Absorption
abilities.description: The gemstone glows brighter when absorbing its associated damage type.

name: Necklace of Zones of Truth
location: Court systems, truth-seeking organizations, justice temples, interrogation specialists
description:
This simple silver necklace bears a pendant shaped like balanced scales. It compels honesty in those around the wearer and can detect falsehoods with supernatural accuracy.

Mechanics: Three times per day, you can cast zone of truth (save DC 15). Additionally, you automatically detect when a creature within 30 feet speaks a deliberate lie, though you don't learn the truth.

properties.Daily Uses: 3 zone of truth spells per day

abilities.name: Truth Compulsion
abilities.description: Force creatures in an area to speak only truth or remain silent.

abilities.name: Falsehood Awareness
abilities.description: Automatically detect when someone nearby tells a deliberate lie.

name: Necklace of Levitation
location: Aerial magic vendors, levitation specialists, gravity manipulation services, floating city shops
description:
This lightweight necklace features a pendant made from levitating stone that hovers slightly above the chain. It grants the wearer the ability to defy gravity at will.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can cast levitate on yourself at will. The levitation lasts for up to 10 minutes, and you can end it early as a bonus action. Once you use it, you must wait 1 minute before using it again.

properties.Self-Levitation: Levitate spell on yourself at will

abilities.name: Gravity Defiance
abilities.description: Levitate yourself at will to reach high places or avoid ground hazards.

abilities.name: Controlled Flight
abilities.description: Move up and down at will while levitating, though horizontal movement is limited.

name: Necklace of Tongues
location: Diplomatic services, translator guilds, international trade centers, cultural exchange programs
description:
This necklace is strung with small carved symbols representing different languages from across the planes. It grants the wearer the ability to understand and communicate in any language.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can speak and understand any language. Additionally, you can read any writing, though this doesn't necessarily impart understanding of the meaning behind complex concepts or cultural references.

abilities.name: Linguistic Mastery
abilities.description: Communicate fluently in any language you encounter.

abilities.name: Script Comprehension
abilities.description: Read any form of writing, regardless of language or script.

name: Necklace of Natural Armor
location: Druid groves, natural armor specialists, beast protection vendors, wilderness survival suppliers
description:
This necklace is made from interwoven vines, bark, and small gemstones that pulse with natural energy. It toughens the wearer's skin to be as resilient as natural armor.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace and no armor, your AC becomes 13 + your Dex modifier. If your AC is already higher, this has no effect. The necklace also provides advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

abilities.name: Bark Skin
abilities.description: Your skin becomes as tough as tree bark, providing natural armor protection.

abilities.name: Natural Immunity
abilities.description: Enhanced resistance to natural toxins and poisons.

name: Necklace of Feather Fall
location: Climbing equipment vendors, aerial safety suppliers, fall protection specialists, mountain gear shops
description:
This delicate necklace is adorned with actual feathers from various flying creatures, each one enchanted to slow falls. The feathers flutter gently even in still air.

Mechanics: When you fall, the necklace automatically activates, casting feather fall on you. This happens automatically whenever you fall 20 feet or more. The necklace can activate up to 3 times per day.

abilities.name: Fall Protection
abilities.description: Automatically slow your falls to prevent damage.

abilities.name: Emergency Safety
abilities.description: Provides life-saving protection in dangerous situations involving heights.

name: Robe of the Archmagi
attunement: yes (by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
location: Ancient wizard towers, arcane academies, legendary magic item collections
description:
This elegant robe is made from the finest silk and adorned with intricate patterns that seem to shift and move on their own. It represents the pinnacle of magical craftsmanship and grants incredible power to those worthy of wearing it.

Mechanics: Your AC becomes 15 + Dex modifier, you have advantage on saving throws against spells, and your spell save DC and spell attack bonuses increase by 2. You gain resistance to damage from spells and can ignore a spell's verbal and somatic components.

abilities.name: Arcane Mastery
abilities.description: Significant bonuses to spell save DC and resistance to magical effects.

abilities.name: Silent Casting
abilities.description: Cast spells without verbal or somatic components.

name: Vest of Escape
location: Thieves' guilds, escape artist suppliers, performer equipment vendors, prison break specialists
description:
This sleek leather vest is reinforced with flexible metal strips and enchanted with liberation magic. It helps the wearer slip free from bonds and escape dangerous situations.

Mechanics: You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks to escape grapples and squeeze through tight spaces. Once per day, you can cast freedom of movement on yourself. The vest also provides resistance to being restrained.

properties.Freedom Spell: Freedom of movement once per day

abilities.name: Slippery Freedom
abilities.description: Enhanced ability to escape from physical restraints and tight spaces.

abilities.name: Liberation Magic
abilities.description: Cast freedom of movement to overcome even magical restraints.

name: Pants of Speed
location: Athletic equipment stores, speed enhancement vendors, courier services, racing organizations
description:
These form-fitting trousers are made from fabric woven with quicksilver threads that shimmer as they catch the light. They enhance the wearer's natural speed and agility to superhuman levels.

Mechanics: Your walking speed increases by 10 feet. Once per day, you can activate the pants to double your speed for 1 minute. During this time, you can take the Dash action as a bonus action.

properties.Bonus Dash: Dash as bonus action when activated

abilities.name: Enhanced Mobility
abilities.description: Permanent increase to movement speed for improved battlefield positioning.

abilities.name: Burst of Speed
abilities.description: Activate for incredible speed that allows rapid repositioning in combat.

name: Shirt of Comfort
location: Comfort item vendors, traveler supply stores, luxury clothing shops, quality of life merchants
description:
This soft cotton shirt adjusts its temperature and texture to keep the wearer perfectly comfortable in any environment. It never wrinkles, stains, or wears out.
